Unit 2 Logarithms and Exponents

Unit Learning Goals
This module will teach you the following about logarithms and exponents: 
A.	Rules (and quick refresher)
B.	Converting between one and the other:
1.	Bases (base 10, natural logarithm)
2.	Log of product equals sum of logs
3.	Log of quotient equals difference of logs
